original_title: Wine Ways: An Introduction to the Culture of Wine
overview: Live life like a famous bachelor -- or at least enjoy your wine like one -- with this refreshing video tutorial hosted by vintner and reality-show star Andrew Firestone ("The Bachelor"). Filmed in California's scenic Santa Ynez Valley, the program takes viewers through the history of wine, agriculture and winemaking, concluding with tips and tricks for savoring and celebrating every last drop. Cheers!
title: Wine Ways: An Introduction to the Culture of Wine
